DOC.detailed_description: In recent year , increase trend number patient GERD . GERD mainly relate reflux stomach content induce dysfunction lower esophageal sphincter . The common symptom GERD heartburn , acid regurgitation , chest pain . The method treat GERD change lifestyle , pharmacotherapy , antireflux surgery endoscopy . However , poor response medicine still notice patient non-erosive reflux disease . And long-term use medicine result many side effect include infectious , abdominal pain , diarrhea osteoporosis . According theory traditional Chinese medicine , acupuncture Neiguan ( P6 point ) could improve uncomfortable symptom chest upper abdomen . Therefore , aim study investigate clinical efficacy Neiguan ( P6 point ) acupressure patient GERD . 64 patient GERD randomly divide two groupsï¼šthe acupressure control . In acupressure group , addition receive standard treatment , patient band hand ring Neiguan ( P6 point ) acupressure seven day . In control group , addition receive standard treatment , patient band hand ring acupressure seven day . Data collect self-recorded symptom intervention , accord Reflux disease questionnaire ( RDQ ) World Health Organization Quality Life Questionnaire Taiwan condense version . Data analyze Student 's t-tests , Paired Student 's t-test , Chi-square , Fisher exact test quantitative qualitative variable . We anticipate treatment Neiguan ( P6 point ) acupressure reduce symptom gastroesophageal reflux improve quality life .
